page.title:
AWIPS A Brief History
AWIPS
A Brief History
page.enlisting:
• The original prime contract for system development was awarded to PRC, Inc on December 29, 1992 – To replace Automation of Field Operations and Services (AFOS) – PRC, Inc later acquired by Northrop Grumman IT (NGIT) – Commissioned - 2000 • Operations phase of original contract expired on • Re-compete contract awarded to Raytheon Technical • The original prime contract for system development was
• The original prime contract for system development was

page.title:
AWIPS I to AWIPS II Re-Architecture Approach
AWIPS I to AWIPS II
Re-Architecture Approach
page.enlisting:
• Perform “black-box” conversion – Preserve existing functionality, look and feel on top of new • Thorough field validation and acceptance before • No loss of functionality – Deployed system current with deployed AWIPS capability (i.e., • Use open source projects - No proprietary code – JAVA and open source projects enable AWIPS II to be platform • Objective is to make AWIPS II available for collaborative • Perform “black-box” conversion
• Perform “black-box” conversion • P e r f o r m

page.title:
AWIPS II Primary Standards & Formats
AWIPS II Primary Standards & Formats
page.enlisting:
Ingested Data Formats – GRIB1/GRIB2 – Gridded data – NetCDF3 – Support AWIPSI/II interoperability – BUFR – Observational Data, e.g., soundings – METAR, SHEF – Surface and hydrological data – GINI – Satellite Imagery – OPRG L3 – Radar Imagery – Text Messages – Text products • Data Store Formats – PostGres – Metadata and select data type store, e.g., text – HDF5 – Binary store for grids, imagery and select observations • Product Distribution – NetCDF3 – NDFD Grids – ASCII Text – Text products Ingested Data Formats – GRIB1/GRIB2 – Gridded data – NetCDF3 – Support AWIPSI/II interoperability – BUFR – Observational Data, e.g., soundings – METAR, SHEF – Surface and hydrological data – GINI – Satellite Imagery – OPRG L3 – Radar Imagery – Text Messages – Text products
Ingested Data Formats
– GRIB1/GRIB2 – Gridded data
– NetCDF3 – Support AWIPSI/II interoperability
– BUFR – Observational Data, e.g., soundings
– METAR, SHEF – Surface and hydrological data
– GINI – Satellite Imagery
– OPRG L3 – Radar Imagery
– Text Messages – Text products
• Data Store Formats
• Data Store Formats
– PostGres – Metadata and select data type store, e.g., text – HDF5 – Binary store for grids, imagery and select observations
– PostGres – Metadata and select data type store, e.g., text
– HDF5 – Binary store for grids, imagery and select observations
• Product Distribution
• Product Distribution

page.normal_text:
NAWIPS Migration Project Goals
NAWIPS Migration Project
Goals
page.enlisting:
• Full NAWIPS capabilities ported to AWIPS II • Software ready for Operational Testing and • No changes to the forecaster workflow – “Gray box” migration – Some visual differences may be unavoidable • Capitalize on new technology • Full NAWIPS capabilities ported to AWIPS II

page.title:
National Centers Perspective
National Centers Perspective
page.enlisting:
• Previous development – Developed a perspective in CAVE to match the legacy – Most tools and menu items are fully functional • Current Development – Focusing on data management, selection and display – Starting to integrate multi-loop and multi-panel displays • Future development – Continue to add data resource types – Begin timeline and time matching • Previous development

page.title:
Product Generation
Product Generation
page.enlisting:
• Fully integrated set of drawing and editing tools with derived product creation capabilities – Text, Graphics, Grids, etc. • Generic objects complete • Meteorological objects – Severe weather watch, SIGMETs, TCAs, Outlooks, etc. • Product-centric infrastructure • Conversion utilities – Legacy VG format to new XML-based format • Fully integrated set of drawing and editing tools
• Fully integrated set of drawing and editing tools
with derived product creation capabilities – Text, Graphics, Grids, etc. • Generic objects complete • Meteorological objects
